Html:
Hi, I want to know how can I determine if I am working on a hidden sheet or no?
I have some Excel files that I work with and I just need the data from the visible sheets not hidden.
Please give me some advice.

Regards,

I've not had any experience of this so I would need to look at the code base again but I'm way too busy too investigate this and I think the other devs are too. It'll be some time before I can look at a sample.
